client_description_Summary_Note:
Schmitt Lorenz Richter and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Madrid. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
With a career spanning nearly 34 years, Schmitt Lorenz Richter has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
client_description_Family_Background: Schmitt Lorenz Richter is married to Gwendolyn. Together they have 1 kid called Carolin.
client_description_Education_Background:
Schmitt finished secondary school at Gymnasium am Stadtgarten Köln in 1985.
After that, he went on to study at ISM Dortmund until 1991.
client_description_Occupation_History:
With a career spanning nearly 34 years, Schmitt Lorenz Richter has established himself as a key player in the industry.
At Reina Sofia Museum, Schmitt Lorenz Richter held the position of Art Dealer from 1991 to 1994, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to CaixaForum as a Gallery Owner, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1995 till now.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 650000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns flat in Logroño, where he resides. It is worth 740000 EUR.


Following the passing of his grandfather, a successful Venture Capitalist, he received an inheritance of 840000 EUR in 2014, which he has used to secure his financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: In summary, Schmitt has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
